content:
# I have successfully harvested 20 iron ore from the patch, bringing my total inventory to 30 iron ore. 
# This is a positive outcome, as I can now proceed to craft stone furnaces and continue my production.

# Since I still need stone to craft the furnaces, I will need to gather stone again. 
# I will check my surroundings for any nearby stone patches that I can access.

# Let's search for the nearest stone resource.
stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)
move_to(stone_position)
print("Moving to the nearest stone patch to gather stone...")
